biography: Olli, a formidable competitor hailing from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. A devoted admirer of Bryson Dechambeau, Olli brings a similar analytical approach to his game, meticulously strategizing each move on the course.

With one Hector Trophée victory already under his belt, as well as one Victor Trophy for best individual player, Olli has proven his mettle in both pairs and individual formats. His experience and dedication make him a player to watch.

Known for his unwavering focus and steely determination, Olli approaches each tournament with the same intensity, making him a tough competitor. While some may find him reserved, those who know him well understand his dry sense of humor and fierce loyalty.
